label: attr-quantitative-explicit-constants
name: Explicit Constant Formulas

explicit_formulas.C_split: (1/2) * lambda * beta * C_chaos * max(C_F, sigma^2, ||nabla^2 U||_infty)

order_of_magnitude_estimates.C_discrete: O(1) to O(10) depending on mixing rate

notes: All constants traceable to system parameters
Useful for parameter tuning and adaptive schemes
C^4 norm dependency arises from Poisson equation regularity
why_c4_not_lipschitz: Poisson equation regularity requires C^4 for error propagation through Markov chain dynamics
